root.api_para: a:4:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"name";s:10:"start_time";s:5:"value";s:10:"2014-01-01";s:10:"directions";s:76:"订单开始时间(此时间是订单的最后更新时间) 如：2014-02-01";s:11:"is_required";s:2:" 1";s:4:"type";s:4:"date";}i:1;a:5:{s:4:"name";s:8:"end_time";s:5:"value";s:10:"2014-06-04";s:10:"directions";s:76:"订单结束时间(此时间是订单的最后更新时间) 如：2014-02-20";s:11:"is_required";s:2:" 1";s:4:"type";s:4:"date";}i:2;a:5:{s:4:"name";s:7:"page_no";s:5:"value";s:0:"";s:10:"directions";s:22:"分页页码(默认:1)";s:11:"is_required";s:2:" 0";s:4:"type";s:6:"Number";}i:3;a:5:{s:4:"name";s:9:"page_size";s:5:"value";s:0:"";s:10:"directions";s:23:"分页大小(默认:20)";s:11:"is_required";s:2:" 0";s:4:"type";s:6:"Number";}}
